Text:
Hi pschnob,
Thanks for these rare files :-) 
PLEASE KEEP ON SEEDING.
Let this torrent live for a while - since the upload is slow one needs time to let it get finished.

Please - i have waited for this since the days of Napster where there were just a few Pearls before Swines tunes.
This is very rare, -  Please seed - i hope this will work!

Correction to my older comment.
This torrent works - fair play to the uploader.
But don't go to the URL that he posts for FTP connection info - it's a malware site.
it's not malware, the webpages use javascript so it takes a moment to load.
